snippet: HOLZ--Jeannette S. (nee Sudhop), on July 13, 2016. Retired Teacher, East Meadow School District. Beloved wife of the late Arthur. Dear sister-in-law to Carl and Irmgard Holz and Family. Also survived by her extended family, Seamus Shanahan, Sheila...
lead_paragraph: HOLZ--Jeannette S. (nee Sudhop), on July 13, 2016. Retired Teacher, East Meadow School District. Beloved wife of the late Arthur. Dear sister-in-law to Carl and Irmgard Holz and Family. Also survived by her extended family, Seamus Shanahan, Sheila Sheridan and Shawn Shanahan. Prayer Service at Edward D. Lynch Funeral Home, 43-07 Queens Blvd., Sunnyside, NY, Sunday afternoon. Funeral Monday 9:30am. Interment All Faiths Cemetery at 11am. Visitation Sunday 2-5 and 7-9pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HOLZ, JEANNETTE S
